markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Mosquito](/Monsters.aspx?ID=733)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These horrifically enlarged versions of the common mosquito often prey upon megafauna like dinosaurs and other large creatures, but they won't turn down a chance to drink the blood of a smaller target—such as a humanoid.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Giant Mosquito](/Monsters.aspx?ID=733)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 175 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +17; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent (imprecise) 60 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +5

**Con** +2

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +17 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 80

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, fly 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
proboscis +17 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d10+7 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) and septic malaria

**Blood Drain** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The giant mosquito has a creature grabbed; **Effect** The giant mosquito uses its proboscis to drain blood from the grabbed creature. This deals 3d6 damage, and the giant mosquito gains temporary Hit Points equal to the damage dealt. A creature that has its blood drained by a giant mosquito is [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) until it receives healing of any kind or amount.

**Septic Malaria**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46))  The victim can't reduce its [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) condition while it's affected by septic malaria; **Saving Throw** DC 24 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 day; **Stage 1** sickened 1 (1 day); **Stage 2** [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) and sickened 1 (1 day); **Stage 3** as stage 2 (1 day); **Stage 4** [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) (1 day); **Stage 5** dead

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-142" />
name: Giant Mosquito
